CustomField.description: A text field for AEs to leave handoff notes for CSMs
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Other helpful information like any secondary contacts, previous providers, communication tips, specific features, & if purchased for insurance. Key selling points: Additional stakeholders: Industry: Business model: Vehicle type: Previous Solution: Program Goals: Training Needs: Timeline: Go-Live Date: Installation: Concerns: Other:
CustomField.label: AE to CS handoff notes
